events.description: Charlie Blackmon homers (2) on a fly ball to right field.
Jurickson Profar lines out to right fielder Will Brennan. 1 out
Kris Bryant flies out to left fielder Steven Kwan. 2 outs
Ryan McMahon walks.
Elias Diaz walks. Ryan McMahon to 2nd.
Mike Moustakas grounds out, second baseman Andres Gimenez to first baseman Josh Naylor. 3 outs
Steven Kwan flies out to right fielder Kris Bryant. 1 out
Amed Rosario singles on a line drive to left fielder Jurickson Profar.

Jose Ramirez grounds into a double play, first baseman Mike Moustakas to shortstop Ezequiel Tovar to second baseman Alan Trejo to third baseman Ryan McMahon. Amed Rosario out at 2nd. Jose Ramirez out at 1st. 3 outs

Charlie Blackmon doubles (6) on a sharp line drive to right fielder Will Brennan. Brenton Doyle scores. Ezequiel Tovar to 3rd.
